'Construct' is a free, open source DirectX game creator. It aims to allow games
to be created in an easy drag and drop manner, using an event-based programming
system, or optionally with Python scripting. It features pixel shaders, motion
blur, zooming and rotations, a Behaviors system, a skeletal animation system, a
debugger, and over 50 built-in objects. In addition, the engine includes support
for 2D physics using the Box2D library. Construct is developed by a group of
students. [http://www.scirra.com/phpBB3/viewtopic.php?f=1&t=2338 ]
